title: Crate Mistake. Please help.
body:
Hey, so I recently bought RP. With a LITTLE bit of my RP I bought a hextach crate (already had a key) and I got a DJ Sona Skin. I also had a Morgana skin (forgot which one) and a Sanguine Garen. So therefore I had three skins. I was drunk at the time (my fault) and re-rolled ALL of them into a Skin Permanent. I then got Tundra Hunter Warwick. Then I got a little upset, so I bought another Crate which got me a Zed Champion Shard and a Statue of Karthus Skin. Could you revert all of this. All I want is my DJ Sona Skin Permanent back. 

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately as you said, this is your own fault and cannot be undone. Perhaps you shouldn't be making purchases while drunk.

> [{quoted}](name=Shreddinator,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Eb1TF2P9,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-07T03:12:27.598+0000)
>
> Hey, so I recently bought RP. With a LITTLE bit of my RP I bought a hextach crate (already had a key) and I got a DJ Sona Skin. I also had a Morgana skin (forgot which one) and a Sanguine Garen. So therefore I had three skins. I was drunk at the time (my fault) and re-rolled ALL of them into a Skin Permanent. I then got Tundra Hunter Warwick. Then I got a little upset, so I bought another Crate which got me a Zed Champion Shard and a Statue of Karthus Skin. Could you revert all of this. All I want is my DJ Sona Skin Permanent back. 
> 
> Thanks in advance!

DJ Sona skin shard back*
